line.originaltext: 1 cup packed brown sugar
1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg
1/2 cup chopped pecans
2 cups all-purpose flour
1 teaspoon baking powder
1 teaspoon baking soda
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 cup butter, softened
1 cup white sugar
3/4 cup apple butter
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1/2 cup whole bran cereal or wheat germ
line.annotation: create_ing(ing47, "1/2 cup whole bran cereal or wheat germ")

line.originaltext: 1 cup sour cream
2 eggs, beaten
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray or grease one 9x13 inch pan.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray or grease one 9x13 inch pan.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray or grease one 9x13 inch pan.
line.annotation: set(t9,"preheat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)")

line.originaltext: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray or grease one 9x13 inch pan.
Prepare the topping by mixing together the brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and chopped pecans.
line.annotation: combine({ing35, ing36, ing37, ing38}, ing50, "topping", "mix together")

line.originaltext: Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
line.annotation: combine({ing39, ing40, ing41, ing42}, ing51, "flour mixture", "sift together")

line.originaltext: Blend together butter and sugar; add eggs and beat well. Add apple butter, vanilla, wheat germ or bran cereal. Add sifted dry ingredients alternately with sour cream; mix well after each addition.
line.annotation: combine({ing44, ing43}, ing52, "butter and sugar", "blend together")

line.originaltext: Blend together butter and sugar; add eggs and beat well. Add apple butter, vanilla, wheat germ or bran cereal. Add sifted dry ingredients alternately with sour cream; mix well after each addition.
line.annotation: combine({ing49, ing52}, ing53, "butter sugar and eggs", "")

line.originaltext: Blend together butter and sugar; add eggs and beat well. Add apple butter, vanilla, wheat germ or bran cereal. Add sifted dry ingredients alternately with sour cream; mix well after each addition.
line.annotation: mix(ing53, , ing54, "beaten butter sugar and eggs", "beat well")

line.originaltext: Blend together butter and sugar; add eggs and beat well. Add apple butter, vanilla, wheat germ or bran cereal. Add sifted dry ingredients alternately with sour cream; mix well after each addition.
line.annotation: combine({ing45, ing46, ing47, ing54}, ing55, "butters, egg, spices and wheat germ", "mix well")

line.originaltext: Bake for 40 minutes.
line.annotation: combine({ing48, ing51, ing55}, ing56, "batter", "add flour mixture alternately with sour cream and mix well")

line.originaltext: Pour 1/2 batter into pan, sprinkle 1/2 the topping over top. Pour remaining batter and top with remaining topping.
line.annotation: separate(ing56, ing57, "1/2 of batter", ing58, "remaining batter", "")

line.originaltext: Pour 1/2 batter into pan, sprinkle 1/2 the topping over top. Pour remaining batter and top with remaining topping.
line.annotation: separate(ing50, ing59, "1/2 of topping", ing60, "remaining topping", "")

line.originaltext: Pour 1/2 batter into pan, sprinkle 1/2 the topping over top. Pour remaining batter and top with remaining topping.
Pour 1/2 batter into pan, sprinkle 1/2 the topping over top. Pour remaining batter and top with remaining topping.
line.annotation: combine({ing57, ing59}, ing61, "bottom 1/2 of batter and topping", "sprinkle the topping over top")

line.originaltext: Pour 1/2 batter into pan, sprinkle 1/2 the topping over top. Pour remaining batter and top with remaining topping.
line.annotation: combine({ing61, ing58}, ing62, "batter in pan", "pour remaining batter")

line.originaltext: Pour 1/2 batter into pan, sprinkle 1/2 the topping over top. Pour remaining batter and top with remaining topping.
line.annotation: combine({ing60, ing62}, ing63, "final cake mixture", "top with remaining topping")

line.originaltext: Bake for 40 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing63, t9, ing64, "apple butter spice cake", "bake for 40 minutes")
